title: Program the Future
body: The winning moment when team MoveMapua won the grand prize in Accenture in the Philippines' Program the Future (PTF) 2020.

title: SOIT Podcast
body: The creators of Sulong (formerly known as BayaniHub) interviewed on their experience participating in Accenture's Program the Future 2020 and their plans on the future of the project.

title: Tekno Gadyet
body: Highlighting technology useful amid the pandemic, Accenture has announced the winners of its yearly Program The Future: The Accenture Technology Campus Challenge 2020 in the Philippines, a competition targeted to foster an innovative culture and mindset among Filipino youth.

title: TNB
body: Last August 29, a group of students from Mapúa University’s School of Information Technology (SOIT) became champions with their tech solution BayaniHub in Accenture Philippines’ Program the Future 2020, conducted via Facebook Live.
